titleInfo.title: papillon
titleInfo.subTitle: a collection of the most admired waltzes & gallopades

mods.tableOfContents: The inauguration waltz / Kalliwoda -- Bolero waltz: from the admired opera "Le domino noir" / D.F.E. Auber -- La favorite: an admired galopade for the piano forte -- The rapture dwelling: a waltz arranged from the popular finale of Balfe's opera, "The maid of Artois" / Charles Jarvis.
mods.note: Selected from the works of Strauss, Kalliwoda, Musard &c.
Date printed under caption title for piece no. 4.
Under the title heading of "The rapture dwelling": "And dedicated to his pupil Miss A.J. Brown".
Probable engraver of music noted beneath imprint as "Moland Sc."
